definition: theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
The Phantom of the Opera by Andrew Lloyd Webber

sentences.english: He worked with the BBC Philharmonic and the Royal Opera House in London.
sentences.chinese: 他在伦敦曾与BBC交响乐团和英国皇家歌剧院合作。

sentences.english: Above, a light artwork illuminates the Sydney Opera House on May 27.
sentences.chinese: 这是5月27日艺术景观灯照耀下的悉尼歌剧院。

sentences.english: The day after you were introduced to me at the Opera-Comique.
sentences.chinese: 您在喜剧歌剧院被介绍给我的第二天就可以对我说嘛。

sentences.english: 1809 - Royal Opera House in London opens.
sentences.chinese: 1809年的今天，位于伦敦的皇家歌剧院开张。

sentences.english: Young conductors earn their spurs in a small orchestra or opera house.
sentences.chinese: 年轻的指挥家们在小乐队或小歌剧院里崭露头角。

sentences.english: The design of the new opera house is ingenious.
sentences.chinese: 这个新的歌剧院的设计真的是很有创意。

sentences.english: It's the story of the old opera house and the ghost of the opera, right?
sentences.chinese: 这个故事讲的是一所老歌剧院和歌剧院的幽灵，对吧？

sentences.english: It's the story of the old opera house and the ghost of the opera, right?
sentences.chinese: 这个故事讲的是一所老歌剧院和歌剧院的幽灵，对吧？

sentences.english: Despite the weather is not good, the guests in the opera house still full.
sentences.chinese: 尽管天气不好，但歌剧院里的客人依然爆满。

sentences.english: At the beginning of the20 th century, flamenco started appearing in theaters and even in movies.
sentences.chinese: 从20世纪开始，佛拉曼科在歌剧院和电影开始出现。

sentences.english: The Sydney Opera House is the mother and father of all modern landmark buildings.
sentences.chinese: 悉尼歌剧院是现代社会所有划时代建筑物的先驱。

sentences.english: It is designed on the model of the Sydney Opera House.
sentences.chinese: 它是仿效悉尼歌剧院设计的。

sentences.english: Ding Lei is accepted when interviewing, point out Guangzhou opern parking space is too little.
sentences.chinese: 丁磊接受采访时指出广州歌剧院停车位太少。

sentences.english: We have taken  a box at the opera.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经在歌剧院定了个包厢。

sentences.english: Soon he made debuts in all the major opera houses of the world.
sentences.chinese: 不久他就在世界所有的主要歌剧院登台。

sentences.english: After failing a singing audition at the Metropolitan Opera, she turned to musical comedy.
sentences.chinese: 在大都会歌剧院的试唱失败后，她转而投身歌舞喜剧。
